amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to enforce Executive Order No. 13690 which establishes a Federal Flood Risk Management Standard that expands the area defined as flood plain and imposes additional standards on any Federal activities in such expanded flood plain.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement Executive Order 13690 and Federal Flood Risk Management Standard.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Abraham amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Abraham amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Abraham.
